name: Skill Racing
description:
Skill Racing is a 2d topdown racer game i made with Godot engine. 

I am still tweaking and planning to add more features - like multiplayer.

If you give it a go, have fun, find bugs, share your thoughts or even support - it is really appreciated.

Now just race and test your skill ;)

Controls for desktop:

Left/Right -> Arrow keys

Accelerate -> Alt

Brake -> Space
